title: Pure Imagination
lyrics: tone Come with me and you'll be in a world of pure imagination Take a look and you'll see into your imagination Come with me and you'll be in a world of pure imagination Take a look and you'll see into your imagination We'll begin with a spin traveling in the world of my creation What we'll see will defy explanation If you want to view paradise simply look around and view it Anything you want to, do it Wanna change the world? There's nothing to it There is no life I know to compare with pure imagination Living there, you'll be free If you truly wish to be If you want to view paradise simply look around and view it Anything you want to, do it Wanna change the world? There's nothing to it There is no life I know to compare with pure imagination Living there, you'll be free If you truly wish to be
